mapper.select: select b.parameter_values as "value", b.parameter_name as "name" from parameter a, paracode b where a.name = #{name} and a.code = b.code
select parameter_id as "id", code as "code", name as "name" from parameter
select code_id as "id", parameter_values as "code", parameter_name as "name" from paracode where code = #{code}
select type as "value", name as "name" from category
select nationNum value, nationName name from nation
